sentence.Network_en: Arthur Murray taught the foxtrot, the tango and the waltz.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿瑟·默里教狐步舞、探戈和华尔兹。

sentence.Network_en: "Waltz with me," he said, taking her hand.
sentence.Network_cn: “来和我跳支华尔兹吧，”他边说边牵起她的手。

sentence.Network_en: She played a Chopin waltz as an encore.
sentence.Network_cn: 她应听众的要求又加演了一首肖邦的圆舞曲。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from German Walzer, from walzen 'revolve'

entry.def: A waltz is a piece of music with a rhythm of three beats in each bar, which people can dance to.

example.tran: 柴可夫斯基的《花之圆舞曲》

entry.def: A waltz is a dance in which two people hold each other and move around the floor doing special steps in time to waltz music.

example.ex: Arthur Murray taught the foxtrot, the tango and the waltz.
example.tran: 阿瑟·默里教狐步舞、探戈和华尔兹。

entry.def: If you waltz with someone, you dance a waltz with them.

example.ex: 'Waltz with me,' he said, taking her hand...
example.tran: “来和我跳支华尔兹吧，”他边说边牵起她的手。

example.ex: Couples are waltzing round the wooden floor...
example.tran: 人们双双对对在木地板上跳着华尔兹舞。

entry.tran: (像跳华尔兹舞一样)轻松自如地进行，游刃有余地做
entry.def: If you say that someone waltzes somewhere, you mean that they do something in a relaxed and confident way.

example.ex: She's probably got herself a new man and gone waltzing off with him...
example.tran: 她极有可能有了新男友，和他的感情发展得一日千里。

example.ex: My cousin Henry, he waltzes in a few months later at three times the salary.
example.tran: 我堂弟亨利几个月之后入职时轻而易举地拿到了3倍的薪水。

means.word_mean: 1. an assured victory (especially in an election)
2. music composed in triple time for waltzing
3. a ballroom dance in triple time with a strong accent on the first beat

auth_sentence.content: Oh fair-haired Alice, how well you waltz!
auth_sentence.res_content: Oh fair-haired Alice, how well you waltz!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Oh fair-haired Alice, how well you waltz!

auth_sentence.content: What wizardry this slow waltz works upon us!
auth_sentence.res_content: What wizardry this slow waltz works upon us!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: What wizardry this slow waltz works upon us!

auth_sentence.content: An old Spaniard who fiddled...so as to make a tortoise waltz.
auth_sentence.res_content: An old Spaniard who fiddled...so as to make a tortoise waltz.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: An old Spaniard who fiddled...so as to make a tortoise waltz.

sentences.en: The waltz is a beautiful dance.
sentences.cn: 华尔兹是一种优美的舞蹈。

sentences.en: He danced the waltz with me.
They waltz to the tempo of the music.
sentences.cn: 他们跟着音乐的节奏跳华尔兹舞。

sentences.en: Even those of us with a tin ear can recognize a waltz.
sentences.cn: 我们这些没有乐感的人也能听得出什么是华尔茲。

sentences.en: The movement of a waltz is very different from that of a march.
sentences.cn: 华尔兹的韵律和进行曲的韵律是不同的。

sentences.en: Will you play us a waltz,please.
sentences.cn: 请给我们弹一首华尔兹舞曲。

sentences.en: He waltzed her round the room.
sentences.cn: 他带她在屋里跳华尔兹舞。

sentences.en: He waltzed across to Helen and sat down beside her.
sentences.cn: 他轻松自如地走到海伦身边坐下。

means.word_mean: 令人讨厌地离开(常擅自带走东西)

sentences.en: The tenants waltzed off with half our possessions.
sentences.cn: 房客顺手牵羊把我们的东西带走了一半。

sentences.en: He just waltzed off and left me!
